methylDeconv 0.0.1

Show scatterplot that compares two results.

Source: R/plots.R
compare_results.Rd

Show scatterplot that compares two results.

Usage

compare_results(res1, res2)

Arguments

res1

result1 from deconvolute()

res2

result2 from deconvolute()

Value

scatter plots, one for each common cell type

Examples

mset <- minfiData::MsetEx
#> Setting options('download.file.method.GEOquery'='auto')
#> Setting options('GEOquery.inmemory.gpl'=FALSE)

res_epidish <- deconvolute(mset, "epidish")
#> RPC was chosen as default for "mode"
#> blood was chosen as default for "reference"
#> Starting EpiDISH deconvolution with mode RPC ...
res_methylcc <- deconvolute(mset, "methylcc")
#> 450k was chosen as default for "array"
#> Loading required package: IlluminaHumanMethylation450kanno.ilmn12.hg19
#> Loading required package: minfi
